events.message: I recently received my order, but the product arrived with a big scratch on the screen and it doesn't seem to work properly.
The reported issue has been identified as a product defect due to damage and faulty condition mentioned by the customer.
The case has been assigned to support agent Emily to handle the product defect complaint.
Hello, I’m Emily from support. I’m sorry to hear your product arrived damaged. Let’s get this sorted out for you.
Could you please send us photos of the scratched screen and the faulty parts to help us assess the damage fully?
Sure, I have attached several photos showing the scratch and the device malfunctioning when I try to power it on.
Thanks for the photos. We can send you a replacement unit immediately or offer a full refund. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement unit as soon as possible, since I need the product urgently.
A replacement unit has been arranged and shipped with express delivery to your address. Tracking details will follow shortly.
Just checking in to make sure your replacement unit arrived in good condition and meets your expectations.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday and it works perfectly. Thank you very much for the prompt support!
We are glad to hear the replacement unit is satisfactory. Closing this case now. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to gather your feedback about our support and resolution process.
